revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #67 Enigma |image = [[File:Enigma.png]] |caption = A completely enigmatic Berry. It apparently has the power of the stars that fill the night sky. |growtime = 1d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |mutation = 0.001% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*40 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Enigma''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by linking your game to a [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] account, obtaining 4 different hints from the Kanto [[Berry Master]] and surrounding an empty plot with berries according to those hints. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 7 days |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Enigma Mutation Odds | colspan=3|
N/A ||
0.04% |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 day -
7 days || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 16 hours -
4 days 16 hours || 192 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
3 days 2 hours 40 mins || 128 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Enigma_Flow_Chart.png|500px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Enigma berries. As the berries needed to be planted are unique to each save file, a general diagram is used here to describe where particular "hinted" berries should go. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | '''North Hint''' || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- style="height: 50px;" | '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' || || |- style="height: 50px;" | || '''South Hint''' || || '''North Hint''' || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || '''South Hint''' || |} == Possible Hints == Due to inconvenience, some berries cannot be selected as hints. Any Gen 3 or 4 berry can be selected, except the following: * Parasitic berries ([[File:Occa.png|15px]] [[Occa]], [[File:Kebia.png|15px]] [[Kebia]] or [[File:Colbur.png|15px]] [[Colbur]]) * Berries that prevent mutation ([[File:Babiri.png|15px]] [[Babiri]]) Here is a list of berries that can be given as hints: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Berry Gen !! Possible Berries |- | Gen 3 || [[File:Pomeg.png|15px]] [[Pomeg]], [[File:Kelpsy.png|15px]] [[Kelpsy]], [[File:Qualot.png|15px]] [[Qualot]], [[File:Hondew.png|15px]] [[Hondew]], [[File:Grepa.png|15px]] [[Grepa]], [[File:Tamato.png|15px]] [[Tamato]], [[File:Cornn.png|15px]] [[Cornn]], [[File:Magost.png|15px]] [[Magost]], [[File:Rabuta.png|15px]] [[Rabuta]], [[File:Nomel.png|15px]] [[Nomel]], [[File:Spelon.png|15px]] [[Spelon]], [[File:Pamtre.png|15px]] [[Pamtre]], [[File:Watmel.png|15px]] [[Watmel]], [[File:Durin.png|15px]] [[Durin]], [[File:Belue.png|15px]] [[Belue]] |- | Gen 4 || [[File:Passho.png|15px]] [[Passho]], [[File:Wacan.png|15px]] [[Wacan]], [[File:Rindo.png|15px]] [[Rindo]], [[File:Yache.png|15px]] [[Yache]], [[File:Chople.png|15px]] [[Chople]], [[File:Shuca.png|15px]] [[Shuca]], [[File:Coba.png|15px]] [[Coba]], [[File:Payapa.png|15px]] [[Payapa]], [[File:Tanga.png|15px]] [[Tanga]], [[File:Charti.png|15px]] [[Charti]], [[File:Kasib.png|15px]] [[Kasib]], [[File:Haban.png|15px]] [[Haban]], [[File:Chilan.png|15px]] [[Chilan]], [[File:Roseli.png|15px]] [[Roseli]] |} == Additional Mutations == Planting Enigma berries next to certain other berries will cause them to mutate. For all of these mutations, the goal berry must already be unlocked for the mutation to occur. Each berry has a 0.04% chance of mutation. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Original Berry !! Mutated Berry |- | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] |- | [[File:Shuca.png|30px]] [[Shuca]] || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |- | [[File:Coba.png|30px]] [[Coba]] || [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] |- | [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |- | [[File:Chilan.png|30px]] [[Chilan]] || [[File:Apicot.png|30px]] [[Apicot]] |- | [[File:Roseli.png|30px]] [[Roseli]] || [[File:Lansat.png|30px]] [[Lansat]] |- | [[File:Haban.png|30px]] [[Haban]] || [[File:Starf.png|30px]] [[Starf]] |} {{Berries}} [[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]
revision.comment: /* Possible Hints */ changed a bit the wording for the hints

As the berries needed to be planted are unique to each save file, a general diagram is used here to describe where particular "hinted" berries should go. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | '''North Hint''' || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- style="height: 50px;" | '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' || || |- style="height: 50px;" | || '''South Hint''' || || '''North Hint''' || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || '''South Hint''' || |} == Possible Hints == Due to inconvenience, some berries cannot be selected as hints. Berry Gen !! Possible Berries |- | Gen 3 || [[File:Pomeg.png|15px]] [[Pomeg]], [[File:Kelpsy.png|15px]] [[Kelpsy]], [[File:Qualot.png|15px]] [[Qualot]], [[File:Hondew.png|15px]] [[Hondew]], [[File:Grepa.png|15px]] [[Grepa]], [[File:Tamato.png|15px]] [[Tamato]], [[File:Cornn.png|15px]] [[Cornn]], [[File:Magost.png|15px]] [[Magost]], [[File:Rabuta.png|15px]] [[Rabuta]], [[File:Nomel.png|15px]] [[Nomel]], [[File:Spelon.png|15px]] [[Spelon]], [[File:Pamtre.png|15px]] [[Pamtre]], [[File:Watmel.png|15px]] [[Watmel]], [[File:Durin.png|15px]] [[Durin]], [[File:Belue.png|15px]] [[Belue]] |- | Gen 4 || [[File:Passho.png|15px]] [[Passho]], [[File:Wacan.png|15px]] [[Wacan]], [[File:Rindo.png|15px]] [[Rindo]], [[File:Yache.png|15px]] [[Yache]], [[File:Chople.png|15px]] [[Chople]], [[File:Shuca.png|15px]] [[Shuca]], [[File:Coba.png|15px]] [[Coba]], [[File:Payapa.png|15px]] [[Payapa]], [[File:Tanga.png|15px]] [[Tanga]], [[File:Charti.png|15px]] [[Charti]], [[File:Kasib.png|15px]] [[Kasib]], [[File:Haban.png|15px]] [[Haban]], [[File:Chilan.png|15px]] [[Chilan]], [[File:Roseli.png|15px]] [[Roseli]] |} == Additional Mutations == Planting Enigma berries next to certain other berries will cause them to mutate. {{Infobox Berry |name = #67 Enigma |image = [[File:Enigma.png]] |caption = A completely enigmatic Berry. It apparently has the power of the stars that fill the night sky. |growtime = 1d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |mutation = 0.001% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*40 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Enigma''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by linking your game to a [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] account, obtaining 4 different hints from the Kanto [[Berry Master]] and surrounding an empty plot with berries according to those hints. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 7 days |- ! Animation |

0.04% |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 day -
7 days || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 16 hours -
4 days 16 hours || 192 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
3 days 2 hours 40 mins || 128 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Enigma_Flow_Chart.png|500px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Enigma berries. As the berries needed to be planted are unique to each save file, a general diagram is used here to describe where particular "hinted" berries should go. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | '''North Hint''' || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- style="height: 50px;" | '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' || || |- style="height: 50px;" | || '''South Hint''' || || '''North Hint''' || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || '''South Hint''' || |} == Possible Hints == Due to inconvenience, some berries cannot be selected as hints. Any Gen 3 or 4 berry can be selected, except the following: * Berries that spread into open plots ([[File:Pamtre.png|15px]] [[Pamtre]] and [[File:Rindo.png|15px]] [[Rindo]]) * Parasitic berries ([[File:Occa.png|15px]] [[Occa]], [[File:Kebia.png|15px]] [[Kebia]] or [[File:Colbur.png|15px]] [[Colbur]]) * Berries that prevent mutation ([[File:Babiri.png|15px]] [[Babiri]]) Here are a list of berries that can be selected: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Berry Gen !! Possible Berries |- | Gen 3 || [[File:Pomeg.png|15px]] [[Pomeg]], [[File:Kelpsy.png|15px]] [[Kelpsy]], [[File:Qualot.png|15px]] [[Qualot]], [[File:Hondew.png|15px]] [[Hondew]], [[File:Grepa.png|15px]] [[Grepa]], [[File:Tamato.png|15px]] [[Tamato]], [[File:Cornn.png|15px]] [[Cornn]], [[File:Magost.png|15px]] [[Magost]], [[File:Rabuta.png|15px]] [[Rabuta]], [[File:Nomel.png|15px]] [[Nomel]], [[File:Spelon.png|15px]] [[Spelon]], [[File:Pamtre.png|15px]] [[Pamtre]], [[File:Watmel.png|15px]] [[Watmel]], [[File:Durin.png|15px]] [[Durin]], [[File:Belue.png|15px]] [[Belue]] |- | Gen 4 || [[File:Passho.png|15px]] [[Passho]], [[File:Wacan.png|15px]] [[Wacan]], [[File:Rindo.png|15px]] [[Rindo]], [[File:Yache.png|15px]] [[Yache]], [[File:Chople.png|15px]] [[Chople]], [[File:Shuca.png|15px]] [[Shuca]], [[File:Coba.png|15px]] [[Coba]], [[File:Payapa.png|15px]] [[Payapa]], [[File:Tanga.png|15px]] [[Tanga]], [[File:Charti.png|15px]] [[Charti]], [[File:Kasib.png|15px]] [[Kasib]], [[File:Haban.png|15px]] [[Haban]], [[File:Chilan.png|15px]] [[Chilan]], [[File:Roseli.png|15px]] [[Roseli]] |} == Additional Mutations == Planting Enigma berries next to certain other berries will cause them to mutate. For all of these mutations, the goal berry must already be unlocked for the mutation to occur. Each berry has a 0.04% chance of mutation. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Original Berry !! Mutated Berry |- | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] |- | [[File:Shuca.png|30px]] [[Shuca]] || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |- | [[File:Coba.png|30px]] [[Coba]] || [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] |- | [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |- | [[File:Chilan.png|30px]] [[Chilan]] || [[File:Apicot.png|30px]] [[Apicot]] |- | [[File:Roseli.png|30px]] [[Roseli]] || [[File:Lansat.png|30px]] [[Lansat]] |- | [[File:Haban.png|30px]] [[Haban]] || [[File:Starf.png|30px]] [[Starf]] |} {{Berries}} [[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]

== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Enigma berries. As the berries needed to be planted are unique to each save file, a general diagram is used here to describe where particular "hinted" berries should go. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | '''North Hint''' || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- style="height: 50px;" | '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' || || |- style="height: 50px;" | || '''South Hint''' || || '''North Hint''' || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || '''South Hint''' || |} == Possible Hints == Due to inconvenience, some berries cannot be selected as hints. Berry Gen !! As the berries needed to be planted are unique to each save file, a general diagram is used here to describe where particular "hinted" berries should go. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | '''North Hint''' || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- style="height: 50px;" | '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' || || |- style="height: 50px;" | || '''South Hint''' || || '''North Hint''' || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || '''South Hint''' || |} == Possible Hints == Due to inconvenience, some berries cannot be selected as hints. Any Gen 3 or 4 berry can be selected, except the following: * bullet.list.item * Berries that spread into open plots (Pamtre and Rindo) * Parasitic berries (Occa, Kebia or Colbur) * Berries that prevent mutation (Babiri) Here are a list of berries that can be selected: '''Gen 3:''' * Pomeg * Kelpsy * Qualot * Hondew * Grepa * Tamato * Cornn * Magost * Rabuta * Nomel * Spelon * Watmel * Durin * Belue '''Gen 4:''' * Passho * Wacan * Rindo * Yache * Chople * Shuca * Coba * Payapa * Tanga * Charti * Kasib * Haban * Chilan * Roseli == Additional Mutations == Planting Enigma berries next to certain other berries will cause them to mutate. For all of these mutations, the goal berry must already be unlocked for the mutation to occur. Each berry has a 0.04% chance of mutation. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Original Berry !! Mutated Berry |- | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] |- | [[File:Shuca.png|30px]] [[Shuca]] || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |- | [[File:Coba.png|30px]] [[Coba]] || [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] |- | [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |- | [[File:Chilan.png|30px]] [[Chilan]] || [[File:Apicot.png|30px]] [[Apicot]] |- | [[File:Roseli.png|30px]] [[Roseli]] || [[File:Lansat.png|30px]] [[Lansat]] |- | [[File:Haban.png|30px]] [[Haban]] || [[File:Starf.png|30px]] [[Starf]] |} {{Berries}} [[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]

{{Infobox Berry |name = #67 Enigma |image = [[File:Enigma.png]] |caption = A completely enigmatic Berry. It apparently has the power of the stars that fill the night sky. |growtime = 1d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |mutation = 0.001% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*40 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Enigma''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by linking your game to a [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] account, obtaining 4 different hints from the Kanto [[Berry Master]] and surrounding an empty plot with berries according to those hints. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 7 days |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Enigma Mutation Odds | colspan=3|
N/A ||
0.04% |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 day -
7 days || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 16 hours -
4 days 16 hours || 192 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
3 days 2 hours 40 mins || 128 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Enigma_Flow_Chart.png|500px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Enigma berries. As the berries needed to be planted are unique to each save file, a general diagram is used here to describe where particular "hinted" berries should go. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | '''North Hint''' || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- style="height: 50px;" | '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' || || |- style="height: 50px;" | || '''South Hint''' || || '''North Hint''' || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || '''South Hint''' || |} == Possible Hints == Due to inconvenience, some berries cannot be selected as hints. Any Gen 3 or 4 berry can be selected, except the following: * Bulleted list item * Berries that spread into open plots (Pamtre and Rindo) * Parasitic berries (Occa, Kebia or Colbur) * Berries that prevent mutation (Babiri) Here are a list of berries that can be selected: '''Gen 3:''' * Pomeg * Kelpsy * Qualot * Hondew * Grepa * Tamato * Cornn * Magost * Rabuta * Nomel * Spelon * Watmel * Durin * Belue '''Gen 4:''' * Passho * Wacan * Rindo * Yache * Chople * Shuca * Coba * Payapa * Tanga * Charti * Kasib * Haban * Chilan * Roseli == Additional Mutations == Planting Enigma berries next to certain other berries will cause them to mutate. For all of these mutations, the goal berry must already be unlocked for the mutation to occur. Each berry has a 0.04% chance of mutation. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Original Berry !! Mutated Berry |- | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] |- | [[File:Shuca.png|30px]] [[Shuca]] || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |- | [[File:Coba.png|30px]] [[Coba]] || [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] |- | [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |- | [[File:Chilan.png|30px]] [[Chilan]] || [[File:Apicot.png|30px]] [[Apicot]] |- | [[File:Roseli.png|30px]] [[Roseli]] || [[File:Lansat.png|30px]] [[Lansat]] |- | [[File:Haban.png|30px]] [[Haban]] || [[File:Starf.png|30px]] [[Starf]] |} {{Berries}} [[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]
